r thanI should. I can't wait till you post the keypad hack. And yourrecordi=
ngs are spot on! Thanks Steve. -Bill--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Sum Du=

ad to pull the pin out, but the newer ones all you have to do > is cut the =

ile with several different methods and now i have > another. ITC never gets=

ick one up and see if > it works > > for me ; )> > Which pin opens the mute=

eve Hultay" <urkel23@>> > To: <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>> > Sent: Saturday, =
November 24, 2007 6:01 PM> > Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Mini AMFM hack> > > > >=

t> > > some of my files from a 5 minute session testing it out. It was > le=

orks> > > pretty good. Let me know what you think of these files.> > >> > >=
 Thanx Sum,> > > -Steve H.> > >> > >> > > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "=
Sumra Dume" <duck@> wrote:> > >>> > >> Hi,> > >> Just Hacked a radio shack =
model 12-469> > >> Cut the Mute pin and presto a fm sweep cheap!> > >>> > >=

t expensive.> > >>> > >> I'll post the complete hack later this weekend!> >=
